**Acceptance Criteria**  
This issue can be closed when the playbook has been updated and the Merge Request has been approved.

**Tasks**
- [ ] Create New Branch
- [ ] Create New Playbook in Playbooks Directory
- [ ] Create Merge Request
- [ ] Close Issue
